subject: Pro X Ultra Pedals problems
description_text:
Hi

I have just received your Pro X Ultra pedals.

When i open up the Simsonn software, the Simsonn Flasher is showing my main controller in upgrade mode, i have pressed the upgrade switch and it has done nothing.

Please can you help

Thank you

Edward Knight

conversations.body_text: Hi edd knight,     You can release the upgrade button on the main controller and then reconnect the USB. The device should then boot into normal mode.
